intheworks.title: Update all commands
intheworks.text: This feature will eventually change all commands to work with the slash commands

intheworks.title: Update Discord.js
intheworks.text: Updated the framework for the bot, will continue keeping up with getting the stragglers working correctly

intheworks.title: Bot Status
intheworks.text: Create a function to update bot status to help display prefix and others

intheworks.title: DATABASE!
intheworks.text: Change the database from sqlite3 to mongoDB. This could help with storing those strange files, and I need something like that for a final for school

footer: I'll try to post one of these every time I start on a new feature, or when one is requested. As always, you can type $help to get a list of commands, and $help <commandname> to get more specific information on a command
